Feature.Name: Sentinel
Feature.Text: Choose a kind of creature that is an enemy of the item's creator. This item glows faintly when such creatures are within 120 feet of it.

MagicProperty.Name: Property - Sentinel
MagicProperty.Description: Choose a kind of creature that is an enemy of the item's creator. This item glows faintly when such creatures are within 120 feet of it.
